content: a very simple description of how to make this corgi ear warmer - for free i spent the longest time trying to find a good knittable chart that would look like my dads dog and when i couldn t i obviously had to draw one myself feel free to use the corgi chart for any projects you want but i would love it if you would mention my original design when doing so and tagging me @ crookedhookery ❤️ the pattern is one size but the size can be adjusted by changing needles and/or yarn weight
